title: Microsoft Office 2007 Multi-Language Proofing Tools SP3 DVD
description:
About this release

Includes: Proofing Tools for Office 2007 products (47 languages)
Requirement: at least one Office 2007 product installed

About Microsoft Office 2007 Proofing Tools

Microsoft Office 2007 Proofing Tools allows people to edit Office documents in 47 languages.
These editing tools may include spelling and grammar checkers, thesauruses, and hyphenators.
Proofing Tools may also include language-specific editing features such as Language AutoDetect, AutoSummarize, and Intelligent AutoCorrect.

Usage

- Mount / burn / extract ISO image
- Install the desired Proofing Tools and restart Office
- Just use the proofing tools as you normally would - you should now see them for your newly installed langauge. For example, you can set your proofing language to the new language to use spell check (if available) - to learn how to do that, see Switch between different languages by setting the proofing language

Depending on which language you are using, proofing tools can check spelling or grammar, hyphenate text, and look up words in the thesaurus.
You can switch between proofing tools by selecting a different language for your document.

Spelling checker
Flags words in a document that may not be spelled correctly and may provide suggested replacements.

Grammar/Style checker
Verifies written text for grammatical correctness and detects stylistic problems.

Thesaurus
Lists synonyms and antonyms of words (if any are available).

Translation Dictionaries
Allows you to translate single words or short phrases.

AutoCorrect List
Fixes typos and misspelled words and inserts symbols and other pieces of text.

Hyphenator
Automatically breaks words at the end of lines and adds hyphens to help justify text within a line.

Contextual Speller
Flags words that are spelled correctly but are not the correct words in the given context.

Please be nice, seed for a while ...
Thanks !
